definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bestow upon, endow with (Ar. zabada; Aram. [[זְבַד]], zabo0 † Ge 30:20, zebdo0 dowry; in Sab. n. pr., v. sub [[זׇבָד]] infr.; also in Palm. n.pr. [[נבוזבד]] Vog:73 and many others ([[זבד]], [[זבדא]], [[זבידא]], [[זבדעתא]], [[זבדבל]] = Zabdibhlov, etc.): see Euting:Sechs Inschr. aus Idalien p. 15), [[זְבָדַנִי אלהים אׂתִי זֶבֶד טוֹב]] Ge 30:20 a (E), appar. in expl. of name Zebulun, cf. Thes Di; another expl. in v:b, v. sub [[זבל]].
